data.question: What is the molecular formula of the synthesized iron(III) phosphate/oxalate material?
What technique was used to confirm the oxidation state of iron in the synthesized material?
What role does the templating amine play in the synthesis of the iron(III) phosphate/oxalate material?
data.answer: The templating amine mediates whether or not the iron(III) is reduced by the organic acid.

data.question: Is the synthesized iron(III) phosphate/oxalate material a pure ternary crystalline structure?
What is the role of DAP in the structure of the synthesized material?
data.answer: DAP acts as a structure-directing template and offsets the negative charge of the anionic framework.

data.question: Does the synthesized material exhibit spectral signatures that identify iron-phosphate and iron-OM bonding?
What is the significance of the Fe−P and Fe−C second coordination shell distances in the synthesized material?
data.answer: They provide a measurable difference that can be used to differentiate phosphate from organic matter binding in complex natural systems.

data.question: Was the reaction to synthesize the iron(III) phosphate/oxalate material conducted in the presence of light?
What is the empirical formula of the synthesized iron(III) phosphate/oxalate material based on the crystallographic data?
Does the synthesized material serve as a model for analyzing structural details of possible phosphate/organic matter binding to iron in complex environmental matrices?
What is the role of hydrothermal techniques in the synthesis of the iron(III) phosphate/oxalate material?
data.answer: Hydrothermal techniques were used to prepare the material starting from 1,3-diaminopropane, FeCl3·6H2O, H2C2O4, and ortho phosphoric acid.

data.question: Is the synthesized iron(III) phosphate/oxalate material charge balanced?
What is the oxidation state of all Fe atoms in the synthesized material?
Does the synthesized material provide a molecular level model to advance the understanding of phosphate binding in complex environmental systems?
What is the significance of the Fe K-edge EXAFS spectrum in characterizing the synthesized material?
data.answer: The Fe K-edge EXAFS spectrum effectively differentiates phosphate from organic matter binding by showing distinct Fe−C and Fe−P second neighbor contacts.

data.question: Can the synthesized material be viewed as a hybrid structure of an alkylammonium templated organic layer and an iron phosphate inorganic layer?
What is the role of oxalic acid in the synthesis of the iron(III) phosphate/oxalate material?
data.answer: Oxalic acid is one of the starting materials used in the hydrothermal synthesis of the material.

data.question: Does the synthesized material demonstrate the critical role of the templating amine in controlling the redox state of the iron?
What is the impact of the reaction medium on the formation of the synthesized iron(III) phosphate/oxalate material?
data.answer: The reaction medium, including the presence of the templating amine and the order of reactant addition, significantly impacts the formation of the material and the redox state of the iron.

data.question: Is the synthesized iron(III) phosphate/oxalate material a useful model for XAS spectroscopic interrogation of ternary complexation in natural systems?
